name.en: Grammar and Writing for Academic Purposes

remark.ch: 學術英文(EAP)中高級課程。 1.歡迎大二以上有修習EMI的學生選修課程 2.課程可抵LN29課號，修課完成後請至語言中心辦理學分抵修。3.第一次上課未出席，需事先跟老師請假，否則扣學期總成績 4.前兩週未出席者，老師有權退選該生。

goal.en: After the course, student should be able to: 1. Understand basic grammar structure 2. Compose grammatically correct sentences 3. Identify different grammatical rules 4. Autonomous grammar learning ability
goal.ch: 上完此課學員因可以: 1. 理解基本英文文法架構 2. 寫出文法正確的句子 3. 認出不同的文法規則 4. 有自主文法學習能力

content.en: The course is designed to improve student’s English grammar ability to an academic level. At the end of the course, students should understand the basic grammar structure, compose grammatically correct sentences, and identify different grammatical rules. The course will be fully student-centered and teacher-centered instruction. Moreover, This course is designed mainly for students to build a strong English base through an interactive learning environment. A mixture of both academic and daily English will be present. Furthermore, since scholars argue, the main purpose of language is to be able to communicate, task-based instruction and student centered instruction will be implemented—meaning, a lot of pair work, group work and interaction. Students will be asked to speak up because practice makes perfect.
content.ch: 此課程規劃讓學員增進個人英文文法能力並達到學術水準。課程結束後學員應可以瞭解基本文法架構並實際的實用。此課會讓學員有分組互相教學的互動。同時真實生活語言會呈現在課堂裡。希望學員可以多發問以便學習。
